settings.text: Give customers details about the banner image(s) or content on the template.

settings.quote: The cupcake jar was a hit with the recipient I bought it for. I tasted one too and it was a very delicious and moist cake.
settings.author: Peggy

settings.quote: The cake jars were AMAZING and such a big hit! The lids were absolutely adorable and the cakes were delicious. I will definitely be ordering from you again for future events.
settings.author: Emily in Charlotte, NC

settings.quote: Your cupcakes in jars really cheered up my brother when he was in the hospital last month. I wish we could go to your bakery in person!
settings.author: Abigail in Albemarle, VA

settings.title: Order Cake Jars
settings.subtitle: Delicious cake layered with homemade buttercream frosting.
settings.description: Treat yourself or send the perfect gift. Cupcakes in the mail complete with spoons and napkins.
